actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to permit a grandchild who has been placed in legal custody of his grandparents to qualify for benefits as a child of his grandparent.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Permits a grandchild who has been placed in legal custody of his grandparents to qualify for benefits as a child of his grandparents under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to permit a grandchild who has been placed in legal custody of his grandparents to qualify for benefits as a child of his grandparent.
